title: Constructivist Learning Design Based on Chemical Molecular Structure Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chemistry Theory and Understanding of Molecular Structures, with Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Designed for advanced domain experts in managerial/leadership roles. Focuses on enhancing chemical visualization competencies linked to language domains.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between molecular structure animations and physical/chemical properties.
Learners build accurate mental models through collaborative problem-solving with peers using molecular-level visualization tools.
Learners can interpret chemical symbols and mathematical expressions in connection with dynamic characteristics of molecular structures.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
